## TextCanvas.render() method

Renders the content of this `TextCanvas`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
render(camera: THREE.OrthographicCamera, target?: THREE.WebGLRenderTarget, clear?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  camera | THREE.OrthographicCamera | Orthographic camera. |
|  target | THREE.WebGLRenderTarget | Optional render target. |
|  clear | boolean | Optional render target clear operation. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
